China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 1 月 12 日星期五 04:28:40 GMT 120
China's exports rise, but deflation persists as economy enters 2024 on shaky footingChina's exports grew at a faster pace in December, while deflationary pressures persisted last month, keeping alive expectations for more policy easing measures to shore up an economy carrying significant pockets of weakness into 2024. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 02:47:11 GMT Q5K7LLT2RVPDXBINQ6IQHDIS4E https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-dec-trade-cpi-paint-mixed-economic-picture-start-2024-2024-01-12/Joe Cash, Ellen Zhang, Liangping Gao市场宏观问题
Blinken to meet senior Chinese official ahead of Taiwan electionsU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken will meet senior Chinese official Liu Jianchao in Washington on Friday, the State Department said in his official schedule, the talks coming just a day ahead of elections in Taiwan that will test efforts to ease U.S.-China tensions. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 02:30:08 GMT UGZZ2HWD4RNXXHPQRCTCR5QGUY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/blinken-meet-senior-chinese-official-ahead-taiwan-elections-2024-01-12/Reuters世界亚太地区
Oil jumps on US, UK strikes in Yemen, shares cautiousAsian shares were cautious on Friday as the escalating conflict in the Red Sea region sent oil prices surging, while slightly higher-than-expected U.S. inflation data did not dent investors' views on early and aggressive rate cuts in the U.S. and Europe. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 02:21:34 GMT TW2E3RVBFRNL3MBXVOOONTCSZM https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-wrapup-1-2024-01-12/Stella Qiu市场
Taiwan says it spotted more Chinese balloons over strait, a day ahead of voteTaiwan's defence ministry said on Friday it detected five Chinese balloons flying over the Taiwan Strait over the past 24 hours, one of which crossed the island, the latest in a spate of such balloons the ministry says it has spotted over the past month. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 02:17:56 GMT QY3OI3K4AROYPGO5ORXEEVR23M https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-says-it-spotted-more-chinese-balloons-over-strait-day-ahead-vote-2024-01-12/Reuters世界亚太地区
China's economy faces growing deflationary pressures as prices extend fallChina's consumer prices declined for a third month in December while factory-gate prices extended their prolonged slide, highlighting persistent deflationary pressures in an economy struggling to mount a solid recovery. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 01:57:04 GMT HPBBAN2GJJSHA7ESCAXAXRRS4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-consumer-prices-stuck-decline-factory-gate-deflation-persists-2024-01-12/Reuters市场宏观问题
Tesla drops prices of some new China Model 3 and Model Y carsThe price of Tesla's new China Model 3 dropped to 245,900 yuan, and the price of the Model Y dropped to 258,900 yuan, as of Jan. 12, according to the company's website. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 01:13:06 GMT EZ3SR565FRIQPHAV35ZD4PMPL4 https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/tesla-drops-prices-some-new-china-model-3-model-y-cars-2024-01-12/Reuters商业汽车与交通
